Author: peachbloompudding
Text: I don't really have any thing helpful to say, but I just wanna let you know you're not alone. It sucks. I hope you find a way to deal with it, sorry you lost a date because of the puking (if it was just because of the puking, fuck him anyway lol).  Part of me is trying to quit because it's just not worth it anymore and I wanna be normal, but the other half is like "no alcohol is my metaphorical baby blanket, and I'm never letting it go".

Author: 3cats_in_atrenchcoat
Text: That's really rough. Cutting down on booze has been probably my biggest struggle but it has helped more than I expected with eating more regularly
